document.full_text: despite blowing a 23-point lead, the cavaliers battled back to beat the miami heat, 102-90, on tuesday night, getting a small dose of satisfaction against lebron james.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: cleveland savors victory against james and heat
lines_and_colors: despite blowing a 23-point lead, the cavaliers battled back to beat the miami heat, 102-90, on tuesday night, getting a small dose of satisfaction against lebron james.
